pageTitle: Game 11: Canucks @ Islanders (10.22.13) - Vancouver Canucks - Features
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5082=Puck drop at 4 pm PT - Live on Sportsnet Pacific, The TEAM 1040, or online at teamradio.ca., 680=Prior to their 4-3 home loss to Carolina on Saturday, the Islanders had earned at least a point in 10 straight games on home ice (7-0-3) dating back to last season. That streak was their longest consecutive home game point streak in 31 years. The 10-game streak pales in comparison to the one they enjoyed back in 1982, however. They went 30 straight games with a point earned from January 2 to October 30, 1982 compiling a record of 28-0-2 during that stretch., 1245=Captains in Islanders team history, the latest being John Tavares who was named to the position back on September 1., 2104=Years since the Canucks' last visit to Long Island – a 4-3 Vancouver shootout win on Jan. 11, 2011.}

textBeforeTable: 2013.14 Regular Season Canucks Leading Scorers Prior to their 4-3 home loss to Carolina on Saturday, the Islanders had earned at least a point in 10 straight games on home ice (7-0-3) dating back to last season. That streak was their longest consecutive home game point streak in 31 years. The 10-game streak pales in comparison to the one they enjoyed back in 1982, however. They went 30 straight games with a point earned from January 2 to October 30, 1982 compiling a record of 28-0-2 during that stretch. Did You Know Games played by Roberto Luongo against the team that drafted him. He has a 7-10-3 career record versus the Islanders. 23 Captains in Islanders team history, the latest being John Tavares who was named to the position back on September 1. 14 Game point streak for John Tavares coming into tonight's game (4-6-10). 7 Game point streak for Henrik Sedin coming into tonight's game (2-4-6). 5 Straight games played without a regulation loss for the Canucks at Long Island (2-0-2). 4 Years since the Canucks' last visit to Long Island – a 4-3 Vancouver shootout win on Jan. 11, 2011. 2 By the Numbers Nabokov shuts
textAfterTable: Islanders Leading Scorers 2013.14 Regular Season Player GP G A P +/- John Tavares 8 4 6 10 1 Frans Nielsen 8 4 4 8 5 Kyle Okposo 8 3 5 8 2 Michael Grabner 8 2 6 8 2 Josh Bailey 8 3 4 7 4 In the Infirmary For the Canucks... F Jordan Schroeder (lower body) and F Alex Burrows (foot) are on the injured reserve list. For the Islanders... D Lubomir Visnovsky (concussion) is on the injured reserve list. F Michael Grabner is serving an NHL suspension.
